H0.text: Announce to the world that her theory is better than the old theory is the action Professor Walden should take as a scientist and leader in genetics after discovering information that contradicts a widely accepted theory.

H1.text: Calling the news media and telling them about her new theory is the action Professor Walden, a genetics researcher at a local university who has discovered information that contradicts a widely accepted theory, should take as a scientist and leader in the study of genetics.

H2.text: Challenging the old theory with scientific evidence is the action Professor Walden should take as a scientist and leader in genetics, who studies genetics at a local university and believes she has discovered information contradicting a widely accepted theory.

H3.text: Request that the old theory be banned is the action Professor Walden should take as a scientist and leader in genetics, because she believes she has discovered information that contradicts a widely accepted theory.

A4.text: If the test results contradict the predictions, the hypotheses which entailed them are called into question and become less tenable.
